name: transfer
description: You are about to send {amount} {token} to {receiver} on {chain}.

name: approve
description: You are about to approve {spender} for spending {amount} {token} on {chain}.

name: swap
description: You are about to swap {token_in_amount} {token_in_symbol} for {token_out_amount} {token_out_symbol} on {chain}.
